name: Flipbox
author: WPDeveloper

sections.description:
Flipbox helps you to deliver content in a beautiful way that your readers can flip the boxes & see messages. Using this plugin, you can easily create flip boxes within Gutenberg & make your website interactive for visitors.
Completely Customizable: You can customize Flipbox just the way you want
Super Light-weight: No extra resources used and it’s highly optimized for super fast loading & instant Live editing
Dedicated Support: We’ve an extraordinary support team ready to help you. Ask your questions in the support forum, we’ll get back to you immediately.

🚀 BACKED BY A TRUSTED TEAM

This Block is brought to you by WPDeveloper, the team behind the most popular elements library Essential Addons for Elementor (used by almost 1 million+ happy users from 180+ countries).

👨‍💻 DOCUMENTATION AND SUPPORT

  • For documentation and tutorials go to our documentation
  • To report issue and contribution visit Github.
  • If you have any more questions, visit our support on the Plugin’s Forum.
  • For more information about features, FAQs and documentation, check out our website at WPDeveloper.

sections.installation:
Modern Way:

  1. Go to the WordPress Block/Gutenberg Editor
  2. Search For “Flipbox”.
  3. Install in 1-click

Old Way:

  1. Upload flipbox to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Follow the Documentation
sections.faq:
Does it work with any WordPress theme?

Yes, it will work with any standard WordPress theme.
sections.changelog:
1.3.1 – 09/04/2024

  • Fixed: compatibility support with wordpress 6.5 version
  • Improved: controls

1.3.0 – 28/02/2024

  • Improved: Line break options in Flipbox block
  • Fixed: Flipbox block’s richtext invalid html tag issue
  • Added: Flip on Click feature in Flipbox block
  • Fixed: Flipbox flip issue fix

1.2.5 – 22/03/2023

  • Improved: Font loader and controls
  • Improved: Minor issues

1.2.4 – 28/11/2022

  • Added: Text formatting option in Flipbox

1.2.3 – 12/09/2022

  • Improved: Update controls and structure

1.2.2 – 03/08/2022

  • Fixed: Minor CSS issues
  • Improved: Converted style handler to PHP

1.2.1 – 31/05/2022

  • Added: Animation, Responsive Controls & Custom CSS options
  • Fixed: Zoom in effect overflow issue
  • Improved: Controls and structure

1.2.0 – 09/02/2022

  • Improved: Few Controls
  • Improved: Default Design
  • Added: Wrapper Alignment Options

1.1.0 – 11/07/2021

  • Improved: Inspector Panel Design & controls
  • Improved: Responsive Device Preview improved. Now the preview options synced with the wordpress’s default preview button.
  • Added: Fade style
  • Fixed: Issue from WordPres.org

1.0.2 – 07/09/2020

  • Added : Keywords
  • Fixed : Missing css files

1.0.1 – 24/07/2020

  • Improved : Typography controls

1.0.0 – 23/07/2020

  • Initial Release
sections.reviews:
Works well, great support

By care2michelle on April 12, 2024

I love the plugin and it basically does what I want it to. I had an issue with a recent update to WordPress, and their support team got right on it and fixed the issue. The only thing I'd improve is a global settings options - so I don't have to individually format all the flipboxes unless I want to. Otherwise, I love it.

Great Support

By Julian Holzmayer (julholdroid) on June 8, 2023

I had a Problem with the flipbox card not working on IOS Safari.
After making a Ticket, the support managed to fix it in fast time :)

top!!!

By afoche on October 25, 2022

It´s perfect, top!!!

Amazing out of the box

By giboo on June 25, 2022

Great simple and amazing flip effect. Lovely Gutenberg block, with complete and fine tuning, and fully functional out of the box !

Does what it says, works with gutenberg

By Marek Dědič (marekdedic) on April 7, 2021

The plugin does what it says on the box. The big advantage is that this is one of the very few flipbox plugins working natively with Gutenberg.

Well it WAS fantastic implementation

By PolyWogg on September 4, 2020

So my initial review was positive, four stars ... as I've reviewed a ton of "collections", all the major block collections, there was nothing like this. Basically, you mouse over like putting your hand over a card on a table, and it turns around to show you what is on the back. When you take your mouse away, it goes back to the first "page". Great for "revealing" information and I could see lots of people using it for quizzes actually. The flipbox options include: - height/width; - style of transition (flip or zoom); - fonts, gradients, etc. My only quibbles are you have to enter the text / content into the block options window to the side, not directly edited on screen AND it seems to only have a mouseover option rather than a click to flip. Pretty solid though. Update: A few weeks later, my site is running dirt slow, and it's not clear why but particularly noticeable on a long post with tables running, and NO flipbox running. But 3 .css files were giving 404 errors and causing significant performance problems. They are: fonticonpicker.base-theme.react.css, fonticonpicker.material-theme.react.css, and font-awesome5.css, all coming from this plugin. Got rid of the plugin, everything is back to normal. P.
